name: Policy: Quote Copy from Policy
description: Grants user access to the Copy From Policy action

name: Policy: Quote Suspense
description: Grants user access to the Suspend action for a quote

name: Policy: Quote Remove suspense
description: Grants user access to the Remove Suspense Quote action

name: Policy: Policy Rewrite
description: Grants user access to the Rewrite action

name: Policy: Cancel Manual Renewal
description: Grants user access to the Remove Manual Renewal action

name: Policy: Policy Set Cancel Notice
description: Grants user access to the Policy Set Cancel Notice action

name: Policy: Policy Cancel
description: Grants user access to the Cancel action for a policy

name: Policy: Quote Delete Endorsement
description: Grants user access to the Delete Pending Endorsement action

name: Policy: Quote Delete Renewal
description: Grants user access to the Delete Pending Renewal action

name: Policy: Policy Set Do not Renew
description: Grants user access to the Policy Set Do not Renew action

name: Policy: Policy Remove Do not Renew
description: Grants user access to the Policy Set Do not Renew action

name: Policy: Policy CTE
description: Grants user privilege to proceed with a cross term endorsement and within-term out of sequence (OOS) endorsement. Note: future-dated cross-term endorsement, when policy is not renewed, is out of scope for this privilege

name: Policy: Policy OOSE
description: Grants user privilege to proceed with a within-term out of sequence (OOS) endorsement

name: Policy: Quote Endorsement Issue
description: Grants user access to the Issue action for an endorsement quote. Grants user access to Roll On action

name: Policy: Inquiry
description: When user navigates to Policy, there on top is drop-down, where he/she can choose Policy Inquiry action. This action allows user to preview current policy. FNOL user is able to select Policy Inquiry action

name: Policy: Quote Issue
description: Grants user access to the Issue action for a quote

name: Policy: Policy Set Manual Renew
description: Grants user access to the Policy Set Manual Renew action

name: Policy: Policy Reinstate
description: Grants user access to the Policy Reinstatement action

name: Policy: Policy Remove Cancel Notice
description: Grants user access to the Policy Remove Cancel Notice action

name: Policy: Policy renewal
description: Grants user access to the Renew action

name: Policy: Policy Update
description: Grants user access to the Update action for a policy

name: Policy: Quote Bind
description: Grants user access to the Bind action for a quote

name: Policy: Quote Rate
description: Grants user access to the Rate action for a quote

name: Policy: Quote Decline by Company
description: Grants user access to the Decline By Company action for a quote

name: Policy: Quote Copy From Quote
description: Grants user access to the Copy From Quote action

name: Policy: Quote Create Version
description: Grants user access to the Create Version button for a quote

name: Policy: Quote Decline by Customer
description: Grants user access to the Decline By Customer action for a quote

name: Policy: Quote Propose
description: Grants user access to the Propose action for quote

name: Policy: Quote Inquiry
description: Grants user access to the Inquiry action for a quote

name: Policy: Quote Update
description: Grants user access to the Update action for a quote

name: Policy: Policy Roll back
description: Grants user privilege to proceed with a roll back endorsement

name: Policy: Quote Initialize
description: Grant user rights to initiate new quote image creation not saved in the database

name: Policy: Update Quote Operations
description: Grant user rights to update Quote operations

name: Policy: Load Operations
description: Grant user rights to load Policy operations

name: Policy: Single BOR Transfer
description: Grants user access to the Single Policy BOR Transfer action for a policy

name: Policy: NPBE Initiate
description: Grants user access to Initiate NPBE action for a policy

name: Policy: Policy Split
description: Grants user access to the Split action for a policy

name: Policy: Policy Spin
description: Grants user access to the Spin action for a policy

name: Policy: Policy Rescind
description: Grants user access to the Rescind action for a policy

description: Grants user access to update premium override

description: Grants user access to the UW Measure Creation action

description: Grants user access to the UW Measure Delete action

name: Policy: Quote Move
description: Grants user access to the Move Quote action

name: Policy: Revert OOSE from Policy
description: Grants user access to the revert rolled on changes from Policy

name: Decision Table: Write
description: Grant user access to Decision Table write action

name: Policy: Archive
description: Grants user access to archive quote/policy
